headline: Jim Cramer on Thermo Fisher: “They Really Got Hurt By COVID”
summary: Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE:TMO) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under the microscope. When Cramer was asked about the stock, he commented: “Oh yeah… they really got hurt by COVID. I gotta tell you, as good as Marc Casper is at Thermo Fisher, I’m still saying that Danaher’s better. They’ve both been […]
